name: Voxythe
description:
Voxythe is a Hack'n'slash voxel game in which you control a little demon that morphes depending on the temperature. Kill the enemies to control the temperature and destroy the obstacles to escape the dungeon !

Made for the Global Game Jam 2022.

Credtis : Antoine Pivaudran, Cynthia Bon, Feyzoow, Lisa Daugès, Marc Ratton, Nathan Tandille
